scripts.c-gen-css: # -- Generate tailwind css AND purs css wrapper
scripts.gen-css: npm run build-css-only && npm run css2purs
scripts.c1-lock-css: # -- Strip away unused css from autogenerated purs files.
scripts.c2-lock-css: # -- This improves rebuild times, but won't allow adding new css.
scripts.c3-lock-css: # -- So re-run gen-css before making additional css changes.
scripts.lock-css: npm run bundle && npm run css-purge && npm run css2purs
scripts.c-start: # -- Launch development server in web browser
scripts.start: npm run build && cp config/dev/index.js public && webpack-dev-server --port 1234 --open --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.prod: npm run bundle && npm run css-purge && webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.c-wp-dev-build: # -- Create unminified dev build. This is useful for troubleshooting the production build.
scripts.c-serve-static: # -- serves static files locally. For checking if everything was bundled correctly.
